title: Dynamic queue music
body: Anyone know what the music is that plays when your in queue in dynamic queue. I have been trying to google it but didn't find it.

replies.body: We'll put it on Soundcloud in the near future.
Can you make it disabled by the "disable music" option?
The music turns off on my end when I uncheck "Music" in the Options. Does it still play on your end when you try that?
That's it, it's just pick intent music that doesn't get disabled.
Ah ok. I'll let the implementation team know of this bug. Thanks for bringing this up!!

You mean reenabling it and disabling it again? Always had it disabled.
Unless what I'm hearing is just a 12 seconds long audio effect with drums and harmony... It starts upon entering champ select, not in the queueing up before.

Yo Sage,

So the dynamic queue music doesn't have a name, nor is it on SoundCloud. Sorry aboot that. But in the spirit of making ears happy, I found a link to someone on YouTube who ganked the [music.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AIT81wmWgiM)
Can it please be considered music and not a sound effect? I have had all client musics disabled for years and now I can't turn off that.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X6k0c2cF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-16T06:45:35.780+0000)
>
> Yo Sage,
> 
> So the dynamic queue music doesn't have a name, nor is it on SoundCloud. Sorry aboot that. But in the spirit of making ears happy, I found a link to someone on YouTube who ganked the [music.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1ODXlseUrs)

The link you posted is actually for the old draft music.

The best YouTube link that I could find is this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AIT81wmWgiM
You might wanna edit your first post in this thread so people looking for it don't find the wrong one. It's not a big thread right _now_, but who knows? :D
